level.text: Each employment agency or employment counseling service shall give to each job-seeker a numbered receipt for each payment received for services performed by the agency or service.
Each receipt for payment shall have printed on it the following information;
The date and amount of payment;
The purpose for which the payment was made;
The legible signature of the person receiving the payment; and
The name and address of the employment agency of employment counseling service.
No employment agency or employment counseling service shall charge a job-seeker in advance of the service for which payment is made.
